Blog.post: hihi again...that ispl is realli one for mi to play at...ha..its so sad to say that i reali cant concentrate..and these few days are quite happily past even though i am surrounded by a hypocrite that i realli wish i can hate and confront one..too bad, she's one good one with so much influence and i realli cant do anything if i wanna survive and not be hated...haha..nvm,,god blesses mi though...

oh..ha..its another examination paper back,this time,its physics and unlike my poor pathetic chemistry,i have done expectionally well [i m satisfied] but for others,u guys have also tried ur best and done ur best, so thr is no any need to cry or dwell over it..its over n another new dae it is tml..i wish i will be satisfied for my other results..even if i din do well,i wont cry caz i know i tried my best..well, ppl muz learn to be satisfied though..or else ppl will think u as an hypocrite..!!hugs to all..!!

well..choir practices are frankly sayin gettin more and nore bored and i reali wish it ends soon..though i was told there would be many choir pracs in the june hols..ha..i would most probably go, but i suppose i wont enjoy it,sadly to say..but i reali is lookin forward to the performance we gonna hav in August at Sentosa..!!!haha..for choir members,so sorry for sayin i dun enjoy the pracs..and also,i hate the fact that im a senior member...i dun wanna be so old soon..!!haha/...
tis period aft exams durin the ispl is gonna be borin though..hope moi klass can come up wif some reali funni things ..haha.

yoz.liFe's up nw caz of the fantastic fact that exams have ended and great life is gonna start..and also that at tis point of life,some ppl have came into mooi= life and i am reali greatful for that though,allowin moi to actualli enjoy life so much more..and also i wanna tanks all of moi bestest n dearest n funniest n playfulest klass~3E5 for givin mi so much more than i have given to ani of u guys,..thanks for that..haha..i was thinkin of a bbq during the june hols..so wad do u guys think of it..??haha..sHesH..some of moi secret chamber's ideas were stolen though..haha..but that;s quite alright.it for the person i trust veri muchy much..haaha..oh..got a call..got to go..+hugs+..
